segments.text: Is the new computerised stock system in operation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not quite . The software engineers are testing it just now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have all the operators been trained on it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , most of them . We trained on a dummy system last month . A couple of people were away so we've organised two more training sessions on the live system for the whole team this week .
segments.speaker: S2
